name: thinBackup-1.14
body:
## What's Changed

### General
* The Plugin now supports **Java 8 and 11** - support for Java 8 will drop soon, since more recent Jenkins versions need Java 11 or 17! The CI is currently only testing Java 11, but Java 8 is still manually tested.
* The plugin is now localizable and supports German 🇩🇪 and English 🇺🇸. Contributions to other languages are welcome!

Special thanks to:
* @mkemmerz for taking care of updating the plugin and unit tests to Java 11!

### New Features 🎆
* Localizing Plugin to German and English by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/52

### Bugfixes 🪲
* [JENKINS-67479](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-67479): Add test and fix for malicious job folder by @krulls in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/33

### Internal
* Bump plugin to Java 11 by @mkemmerz in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/39
* Update documentation by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/51
* Removed unused imports and minor refactorings by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/50
* Bump plugin from 4.50 to 4.51 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/54
* Bump bom-2.346.x from 1678.vc1feb_6a_3c0f1 to 1706.vc166d5f429f8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/53


## New Contributors
* @krulls made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/33

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/compare/thinBackup-1.13...thinBackup-1.14

name: thinBackup-1.13
body:
## What's Changed

There is a new feature to also include the `config-history` folder in the backup - for details take a look at [JENKINS-64973](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-64973). **If you used the regex to configure that**, consider the new feature 

### General
* Use https instead of http link to wikipedia by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/46
* Bump plugin from 4.47 to 4.49 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/45
* Bump plugin from 4.49 to 4.50 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/49

### New Features
* Add option to also backup `config-history` folder by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/47

### Internal
* Use ionicons-api version provided by bom by @NotMyFault in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/48

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/45
* @NotMyFault made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/48

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/compare/thinBackup-1.12...thinBackup-1.13

name: thinBackup-1.12
body:
## General

* ThinBackup now needs at least Jenkins **2.346.1** and uses the [ionicons-api-plugin](https://github.com/jenkinsci/ionicons-api-plugin) 
* Use new Icons and update Settings section

Special thanks to:
* @kauppfbi for the UI improvements 🎇
* @mkemmerz for working on the Spotbugs issues 🪲


## New Features
* feat: update to jenkins lts version 2.346.1 by @kauppfbi in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/40
* feat: integrate ionicons and update jenkins version to 2.346.1 by @kauppfbi in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/41
* Stop setting `pluginFirstClassLoader` by @basil in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/32
* docs: update images in readme with latest ui enhancements by @kauppfbi in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/44
* feat: redesign plugin index page by @kauppfbi in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/42

## Bugfixes
* fix: remove broken img references in page headers by @kauppfbi in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/43

## Internal
* Fix spotbugs warnings - Null pointer dereferences by @mkemmerz in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/38
* Minor test improvements by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/35
 

## New Contributors
* @mkemmerz made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/38
* @basil made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/32
* @kauppfbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/41

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/compare/thinBackup-1.11...thinBackup-1.12

name: thinBackup-1.11
body:
Releases will now be announced here. 

## General
* Removed up for adoption notice by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/37


## New features
* Move thinBackup to Tools section in newer Jenkins versions by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/30
* Use latest plugin pom and require at least Jenkins 2.222.1 by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/34
* Add ability to backup Mulitbranch pipeline jobs and builds by @refortin in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/15


## Bugfixes
* [FIX JENKINS-30144] backup nodes directory by @kna in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/8
* Fix restoring plugins blocking forever if no plugin needs restore by @a4840639 in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/16
* Minor spelling mistake: "granded" -> "granted" by @zerojay in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/9
* Fix for copyDirectory failing on encountering broken symlinks or unreadable files by @sandipnath in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/14
* Check multibranch indexing dir exists by @AbelNavarro in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/24


## Internal
* Update pom.xml to ensure tests are not run in parallel by @scoheb in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/7
* Add Jenkinsfile by @olivergondza in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/10
* Code cleanup by @darxriggs in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/12
* Migrate docs in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/19
* Fix project URL by @seanf in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/27
* Fix typos and move images into repo by @MarkEWaite in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/29
* Set IntelliJ files to gitignore by @StefanSpieker in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/36
* chore: typo in plugin name by @jgraglia in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/25
* Fix typo: quiter -> quite by @mig5 in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/23
* Update pom.xml by @kellcomnet2 in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/22
* Link has typo by @doodoori2 in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/20
* bump findbugs-maven-plugin to 3.0.4 as 3.0.3 does not work with maven… by @PhilippHomann in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/17

## New Contributors
* @scoheb made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/7
* @kna made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/8
* @zerojay made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/9
* @olivergondza made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/10
* @darxriggs made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/12
* @refortin made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/15
* @a4840639 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/16
* @sandipnath made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/14
* @PhilippHomann made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/17
* @doodoori2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/20
* @kellcomnet2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/22
* @mig5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/23
* @jgraglia made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/25
* @seanf made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/27
* @MarkEWaite made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/29
* @AbelNavarro made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/24

## New Maintainer
* @StefanSpieker made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/pull/30


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/thin-backup-plugin/commits/thinBackup-1.11
